Infectum.text: k-qoyəm u=ʕavd gorəš fardo d-rəḥyo w-maḥatle ʕal ṣawʕe w-mabramle (…) hul d-šuḥno xd-i=nuro w-g-zorag-la l-Xāngīr ‘The giant pulled out the millstone, put it on his finger, spinned it until it became warm as fire and threw it at Xangir’ 73/98;

idioms: (ruḥe) sich stürzen, springen auf, stossen auf;
